skills.heading: Skills
skills.tip: Hover or focus on a skill to see more details!
skills.AutomationDesc: Skilled in designing and maintaining robust automated test suites to accelerate release cycles and improve software reliability.
skills.ManualDesc: Experienced in thorough manual testing, exploratory testing, and crafting detailed bug reports to ensure high-quality user experiences.
skills.JavaDesc: Strong knowledge in Java, focusing on writing automation scripts and backend testing.
skills.SeleniumDesc: Proficient in using Selenium for frontend automation, ensuring high-quality user interfaces.
skills.SQLDesc: Strong SQL skills for database testing, data validation, and troubleshooting backend issues.
skills.PostmanDesc: Proficient in API testing using Postman for functional and regression testing.
skills.AIDesc: Leveraging AI-powered tools and frameworks to enhance test coverage, analyze results, and drive smarter quality assurance strategies.
skills.CucumberDesc: Experience with BDD and using Cucumber for writing automated tests in collaboration with development teams.
skills.CypressDesc: Experienced with Cypress for modern frontend testing and end-to-end scenarios.
skills.JenkinsDesc: Expertise in continuous integration using Jenkins to streamline testing and deployments.
skills.GitDesc: Advanced version control skills with Git for managing source code and collaborating with teams.
skills.AgileDesc: Experienced in Agile methodologies, including sprint planning, retrospectives, and continuous improvement.

work.heading: Work & Projects
work.experienceAt: at a leading IT consultancy (2022 - Present)
work.experience1: Developed and maintained automated test suites for web and backend systems
work.experience2: Participated in agile ceremonies and sprint planning
work.experience3: Maintained CI/CD pipelines and test reporting
work.experience4: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure high-quality releases
work.project1Desc: Worked on a large-scale media buying platform, focusing on backend and UI testing, building stable automation pipelines, and improving regression test reliability.
work.project1Item1: Built and maintained E2E and API automation frameworks
work.project1Item2: Enhanced test coverage and reduced manual effort
work.project1Item3: Worked closely with developers and business analysts
work.project2Desc: Contributed to a sports betting platform, responsible for test planning, automation, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure high-quality releases.
work.project2Item1: Designed and executed test plans for complex features
work.project2Item2: Automated critical user journeys and backend flows
work.project2Item3: Improved defect tracking and reporting processes
